definitions.definition: a person, typically a woman, who engages in sexual activity for payment.
examples: call girl, whore; Moreinformalhooker; working girl, lady of the evening, streetwalker, member of the oldest profession, moll, fille de joie, escort, courtesan, hustler; ho; datedtart, scarlet woman, camp follower, cocotte, strumpet, harlot, trollop, woman of ill repute, wench "undercover cops posing as prostitutes"Morehooker; working girl, lady of the evening, streetwalker, member of the oldest profession, moll, fille de joie, escort, courtesan, hustler; ho; tart, scarlet woman, camp follower, cocotte, strumpet, harlot, trollop, woman of ill repute, wench undercover cops posing as prostitutes

definitions.definition: a person who misuses their talents or who sacrifices their self-respect for the sake of personal or financial gain.
offer (someone, typically a woman) for sexual activity in exchange for payment.
examples: although she was paid $15 to join a man at his table, she never prostituted herself

definitions.definition: put (oneself or one's talents) to an unworthy or corrupt use or purpose for the sake of personal or financial gain.
examples: his willingness to prostitute himself to the worst instincts of the electorate
synonyms: pervert; abandon one's principles (at the expense of) "they prostituted their art"
